transcript:
Customer: Mere tan man dhadkan mein ya Ram.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji.
Customer: Ya hi sir good morning. Jo sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi. Catalog catalog ka kya hua?
Customer: Sir us pe chal raha hai kaam.
Executive: Uski PDF mein bhej do aapko?
Customer: Sir PDF nahi mujhe aap uska photos bhejo sir.
Executive: Haan haan ye photo ki PDF photo ka catalog bhej do mein? Tyre ki photo ke catalog bhej do?
Customer: Haan aap mujhe wo bhejo photo bhejo.
Executive: Kis mein bhejna hai mujhe high likh do.
Customer: Ek second.

Customer: Aap mujhe ek baar sir apna whatsapp number bolenge?
Executive: 82300
Customer: 82340
Executive: 04 3193.
Customer: Sir ek second 82340.
Executive: 8230043193.

Customer: Sir aapki is company ke kitne number hai sir? Maine already matlab kisi kisi number pe maine connect kar rakha hai. Dekho maine abhi aapko ek number se aur message bheja hai. High ka message aaya hoga sir.
Executive: Nahi aaya hai.
Customer: 820043196 yahi hai na sir?
Executive: 1936 nahi three.
Customer: 8200
Executive: 0
Customer: Haan 43
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: 193.

Customer: Dekho maine aapko abhi fir se high ka message bheja hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Sir aapne jo mujhe ye haan aapne jo mujhe ye wala PDF bheja tha sir isme na aapke code wagera likhe hue hai.
Executive: Chalo theek hai ye aa gaya dekh lo aap.
Customer: Is aur PDF bhejo mein last time hi pehle aap dekh to ek baar discuss kar le kaise karna hai.

Customer: Baki sir leads wagera matlab bahut kam kyun consume kar rahe ho sir? Buyleads wagera zyada buyleads wagera aap zyada kyun nahi consume kar rahe ho sir? Sir keval che lead 10 lead.
Customer: Itni leede aapne consume kari hai koi issue hai sir? Aap mujhe batao na.
Executive: Truck tyre ki mujhe lead nahi chahiye.
Customer: Kiski lead nahi chahiye?
Executive: Truck tyre ki nahi chahiye mujhe lead.
Customer: Aur kiski lead chahiye sir?
Executive: Mujhe car ki chahiye car tyre ki aur two wheeler car ki. Two wheeler tyre ki.
Customer: To sir aapke pass car wala tyre ka lead hai to sir.
Executive: Kahan car car tyre ke liye main thodi unke sath dimag kharab karunga.
Executive: 10000 15000 ki lead ke liye main thodi dimag kharab karunga uske sath. Maximum mere pass 50000 ka 50000 ka order hona chahiye.
Customer: 50000 ka. Haan. To aap waha pe sir order value ka filter lagao aapko truck tyres mein nahi deal karna hai right? Maine aapko bola tha aap ye truck tyre ki jo category hai ye remove kar dijiye ek bari.
Executive: Main aapko phone karta hu iske liye aapka is number pe aapka personal number hai na usme main phone karunga aapko 2:30 baje 3:00 baje ke aas pass.
Customer: Sir ji aap kya dekho sir har bar ek kam karte hai na sir aaj laptop available rehta hai sir aapke pass?
Executive: Haan isliye abhi mobile pe aur main abhi shop pe nahi hu bahar hu.
Customer: Nahi aap apni shop pe kab tak pahuchoge sir aap mujhe ye batao.
Executive: Wahi to bol raha hu 2:30 baje 2 3 baje ke aas pass utne mein bol raha hu aapko.
Customer: 3 baje ke aas pass pahuchoge theek hai to ek bar kya karte hai sir 4 baje 2:30 3 3 baje ka sir main video meeting ke liye calendar book kar du aapka?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To isme hum kya karenge na sir pehla to aap mujhe apne photos wala wo bhej dena. Maine bhej diya lekin phone chalu hai na isliye abhi upload wo abhi ab mein aaya nahi. Abhi sir kuch kuch jo aapke photos hai na kuch kuch add hue hai char panch hum log ne kar diye hai che saat. Abhi aap mujhe aap wo photo wala wo bhej chuke ho to wo aa jayega mere pass to isme jab aap abhi video meeting pe aaoge sir to pehla ye truck tyre wala category remove karwa dungi main aapse. Dusra sir main aapko aapki lead consumption ka ek bar wo dikhaungi ki kaise aapka lead consumption chal raha hai sir matlab keval che leede sir humne consume kari hai to business sir ji main kaise dilwa paungi aapko fir aap is pe itna hyper ho jate ho aap baat bhi nahi sunte ho meri bilkul mujhe ki aap ek bar baat samjho to ki main aapko kya samjhana chah rahi hu. Sir lead wagera nahi consume karenge business kaise milega sir to main aapko 3 baje sir ek bar video meeting pe connect karti hu fir main aapko ek bar fir se sari cheeze guide karti hu sir.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: Theek hai please sir 3 baje available rahiyega aap.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai pakka.
Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants photos of the catalog.

- Customer is not consuming enough buyleads.

- Customer does not want truck tyre leads.

- Customer wants leads for car and two-wheeler tyres.

- Customer wants order value of ₹50,000.



Resolution:

- Executive took customer's WhatsApp number.

- Executive agreed to remove the truck tyre category.

- Executive will show lead consumption in video meeting.

- Executive scheduled a video meeting for 3:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to be available for video meeting at 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, tyres, video meeting, lead consumption
